description: ff. 68. 215 x 155; 155 x 84 mm. 13 lin. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1146. Discourses of Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān al-Shurnūbī (d. 994/1586) with his disciple Muḥammad al-Bulqīnī: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 446 (18: no. 3); S II, 469; Catalogue of the Mingana collection of manuscripts, IV, 1304 (unidentif.). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى احل اولىاءه دار المقامة
author: Shurnūbī, Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān, 1524 or 5-1585 or 6.
